$697,500 10 East End Avenue (79th Street) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,350-sq.-ft. co-op in a post-World War II building; 24-hr. doormen, windowed kitchen, central air-conditioning, 1,000-sq.-ft. terrace, common roof deck; maintenance, $739, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $739,000, 26 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$2.16 million 525 East 80th Street 4-bedroom, 4-bath, 3,200-sq.-ft. condo in a post-World War II building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, library, 10-ft. ceilings, 2 exposures; common charge, $1,827; taxes, $17,988; listed at $2.16 million, 5 weeks on market (brokers: Halstead Property Co.; Brown Harris Stevens)

$770,000 142 West End Avenue (66th Street) (Lincoln Towers) 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,300-sq.-ft. co-op in a post-World War II building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, terrace; maintenance, $1,416, including gas and electricity, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $760,000 (multiple bids), 3 weeks on market (broker: Klara Madlin Real Estate)

$400,000 45 Pineapple Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a post-World War II building; eat-in kitchen, hardwood floors, common gardens and roof deck, Manhattan skyline view; maintenance, $1,187, 55% tax-deductible; listed at $420,000, 5 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group Brooklyn)

$475,000 443 12th Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,700-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a pre-World War II loft building; elevator, dining area, 16-ft. ceilings, 17 closets, hardwood floors, washer-dryer, common roof deck; maintenance, $701, 68% tax-deductible; listed at $500,000, 2 weeks on market (broker: Heights Berkeley Real Estate)

$941,250 2737 Palisade Avenue 5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 75-year-old, Mediterranean-style house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, study, sun room, central air-conditioning, partial Hudson River view, 0.16-acre lot; taxes, $2,822; listed at $975,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: John Edwards Real Estate)

$599,000 71-41 Harrow Street 5-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 70-year-old, detached brick house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, fireplace, semifinished basement, 1-car garage, 40-by-84-ft. lot; taxes, $3,429; listed at $599,000, 1 week on market (broker: Sarah Jones Real Estate)

$1.189 million 80 Davis Avenue 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, newly built colonial-style house; 2-story entrance foyer, dining room, eat-in kitchen, study, wraparound porch, 2-car garage, 0.28-acre lot; taxes not yet assessed; listed at $1.195 million, 10 weeks on market (brokers: Michael Holmes; Coldwell Banker/Country Properties)

$1.6 million 3632 Congress Street 5-bedroom, recently built colonial-style house, with 5 full and 2 half baths; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, den, library, wide-plank floors, 4 fireplaces, whirlpool bath, 3-car garage, 1.5-acre lot; taxes not yet assessed; listed at $1.649 million, 1 week on market (broker: Prudential Connecticut Realty)

$1.795 million 530 North Street 5-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 16-year-old center-hall colonial-style house; entry foyer with marble floors, dining room, library, family room, solarium, eat-in kitchen, 2 fireplaces, circular driveway, 3-car garage, 2-acre lot; taxes, $15,178; listed at $1.795 million, 3 weeks on market (broker: Coldwell Banker/Greenwich; William Raveis Real Estate)
